bibl.title: The Mystery Cloud of 536 CE in the Mediterranean Sources.
bibl.note: Pp. 87-92: Papyrological Evidence. "The traces are so faint that we would be justified in denying any mark of the mystery cloud in our documentation". Comparison with the Antonine plague.
bibl.seg: ARJAVA Antti, The Mystery Cloud of 536 CE in the Mediterranean Sources.
Pp. 87-92: Papyrological Evidence. "The traces are so faint that we would be justified in denying any mark of the mystery cloud in our documentation". Comparison with the Antonine plague.
